name: Factuursturen integration
author: Fly Webservices

sections.description:
This plugin passes all payments to Factuursturen and creates automatic invoices. Works with WooCommerce payments and Pronamic payments.

Supported Plugins

The following plugins are supported by the Factuursturen plugin:

  • WooCommerce
  • Gravity Forms
  • Pronamic Pay
sections.installation:
To obtain API Key:

  • Log in to your factuursturen.nl account
  • Go to your settings (left in the menu)
  • Click on the option “Connections” (verbindingen)
  • If you didn’t create a key yet, click on the button “Create API key” (maak API sleutel) and fill the form

  • Fix for WooCommerce line item prices

0.2.2

  • Fix for country not found in Woocommerce

0.2.1

  • Fix for empty contacts in Factuursturen

0.2.0

  • Added Pronamic payment integration

0.1.0
